header.title: Apparel Sourcing Solutions
header.subtext: Use our experience, network and on-the-ground offline support to grow in the region

blocks.title: Manual Matching
blocks.content:
We offer advice on woven, knit, denim and jersey apparel production of basic to high-end products. 

Tell us what you are looking for and we link you with vetted suppliers based on your business requirements (product, price, MOQ, lead times).

blocks.title: Support services
blocks.content: Save time and build your supply chain in Africa with our on-the-ground support. Pick and choose from our range of services tailored to your business needs.
blocks.learnmore:
* Factory compliance
* Raw material monitoring
* Product development & sampling
* Order follow-up
* Quality control
* Logistics & distribution

blocks.title: Virtual Factory
blocks.content: Use us as your one-stop shop supplier solution to access our trusted specialised factories producing woven, denim, jersey and knitwear.
blocks.learnmore:
* Financing of raw materials
* Access our network of vetted factories
* Complete service: sample development, merchandising, quality control & logistics

blocks.title: Country representatives
blocks.content: Our network of Country Representatives offer production support services in the main Producing countries, and customer-facing support in the principal Buying countries.
blocks.learnmore:
* Producing countries: Mauritius, Madagascar, South Africa, Swaziland, Lesotho, Botswana, Tanzania, Ethiopia, Morocco, Tunisia, Kenya, Uganda
* Buying markets: USA, Italy, Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Belgium, Netherlands, Luxembourg, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Baltic Countries, Poland, Ukraine, Russia, South Africa, Reunion
